Contact and Acknowledgements

Acknowledgements

PipeCraft2 development has been supported by:

  • European Regional Development Fund and the programme Mobilitas Pluss, MOBTP198.

  • Horizon Europe under the Biodiversity, Circular Economy and Environment (REA.B.3); co-funded by the Swiss State Secretariat for Education, Research and Innovation (SERI) under contract number 22.00173; and by the UK Research and Innovation (UKRI) under the Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy’s Horizon Europe Guarantee Scheme.
